workflow.name: Predict tenant churn and manage retention with GPT-4, Gmail, Slack and your CRM
workflow.description:
## How It Works
Automates daily tenant analytics, churn risk evaluation, and proactive retention by unifying tenant data from multiple sources, applying GPT-4‚Äìbased risk scoring, detecting early churn indicators, routing high-risk tenants to retention specialists, and initiating targeted engagement campaigns. It retrieves tenant profiles, service requests, and feedback data, performs GPT-4 analysis with detailed churn risk insights, assesses engagement levels, escalates high-risk tenants to dedicated communication teams, delivers personalized loyalty incentives and engagement emails, and updates CRM systems and retention dashboards. Designed for property management companies and SaaS providers.
 
## Setup Steps
1. Configure tenant data sources.
2. Connect OpenAI GPT-4 API for risk analysis and churn prediction.
3. Set up Gmail, Slack, and CRM credentials for communication and tracking.
4. Define churn risk thresholds, retention messaging templates, and reward programs.

## Prerequisites
Tenant/customer data source; service request system; feedback collection tool;  

## Use Cases
Property management automating tenant retention across portfolios; 

## Customization
Adjust churn risk algorithms and thresholds,  

## Benefits
Predicts churn before it happens, enables proactive retention

workflow.name: Smart AI-Driven Tenant Experience & Retention Manager

options.systemMessage:
You are a tenant experience analyst specializing in predicting satisfaction and churn risk.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze tenant engagement patterns, service request history, and feedback data
2. Calculate a satisfaction score (0-100) based on feedback sentiment, response times, and issue resolution
3. Predict churn risk score (0-100) considering: unresolved issues, negative feedback trends, lease renewal proximity, engagement decline
4. Classify churn risk level as low (<40), medium (40-70), or high (>70)
5. Identify key issues affecting tenant satisfaction
6. Recommend specific retention actions (personalized communications, loyalty rewards, lease incentives)
7. Assess engagement level based on interaction frequency and responsiveness

Provide comprehensive analysis with actionable insights for each tenant.

parameters.text: =High-risk tenant detected: {{ $json.tenantName }} (ID: {{ $json.tenantId }}). Churn risk: {{ $json.churnRiskScore }}%. Key issues: {{ JSON.stringify($json.keyIssues) }}. Recommended actions: {{ JSON.stringify($json.recommendedActions) }}.

options.systemMessage:
You are a tenant retention specialist focused on preventing churn for high-risk tenants.

Your task is to:
1. Use the Gmail Tool to send a personalized retention email to the tenant addressing their specific concerns and offering solutions (lease incentives, service improvements, or special accommodations)
2. Use the Slack Tool to notify the property management team about the high-risk tenant with a summary of issues and recommended immediate actions
3. Craft empathetic, solution-oriented communications that demonstrate care and commitment to tenant satisfaction
4. Include specific incentives or offers based on the tenant's issues (rent discount, amenity upgrades, priority maintenance)

Execute both communication actions and confirm completion.

assignments.name: emailSubject
assignments.value: Thank You for Being a Valued Tenant!

assignments.name: emailBody
assignments.value:
=

Dear {{ $json.tenantName }},

We appreciate your continued tenancy and positive engagement with our community. As a token of our gratitude, we're pleased to offer you an exclusive loyalty reward.

Your Reward: 10% off your next month's rent or a complimentary amenity upgrade.

Thank you for making our community a great place to live!

Best regards,
Property Management Team

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ { tenantId: $json.tenantId, satisfactionScore: $json.satisfactionScore, churnRiskScore: $json.churnRiskScore, churnRiskLevel: $json.churnRiskLevel, lastAnalyzed: new Date().toISOString(), actionsTaken: $json.recommendedActions } }}

={{ { tenantId: $json.tenantId, tenantName: $json.tenantName, satisfactionScore: $json.satisfactionScore, churnRiskScore: $json.churnRiskScore, churnRiskLevel: $json.churnRiskLevel, engagementLevel: $json.engagementLevel, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() } }}

parameters.content:
## Customization
Adjust churn risk algorithms and thresholds,  

## Benefits
Predicts churn before it happens, enables proactive retention

## Setup Steps
1. Configure tenant data sources.
2. Connect OpenAI GPT-4 API for risk analysis and churn prediction.
3. Set up Gmail, Slack, and CRM credentials for communication and tracking.
4. Define churn risk thresholds, retention messaging templates, and reward programs.

## How It Works
Automates daily tenant analytics, churn risk evaluation, and proactive retention by unifying tenant data from multiple sources, applying GPT-4‚Äìbased risk scoring, detecting early churn indicators, routing high-risk tenants to retention specialists, and initiating targeted engagement campaigns. It retrieves tenant profiles, service requests, and feedback data, performs GPT-4 analysis with detailed churn risk insights, assesses engagement levels, escalates high-risk tenants to dedicated communication teams, delivers personalized loyalty incentives and engagement emails, and updates CRM systems and retention dashboards. Designed for property management companies and SaaS providers.

## Execute Retention Actions and Updates
What: Sends personalized communications, loyalty rewards, and engagement campaigns .
Why: Delivers timely, relevant interventions that reduce churn and strengthen relationships.

## Assess Churn Risk
What: Uses GPT-4 to analyze behavioral signals and assign churn risk scores.
Why: Identifies at-risk tenants early for proactive intervention.

## Consolidate Tenant Intelligence
What: Merges tenant data from service requests, feedback, and engagement systems.
Why: Provides holistic view of tenant health and satisfaction across touchpoints.

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
